name: Totally Siblings!
description:
Created for the Black & White Jam in under 2 weeks.

Totally Siblings is a short 10-20 minutes game created with Wolf RPG Editor about a girl snooping around for a book while going through a hard time in her life with her brother supporting her.

Featuring:

- Focus on heartwarming story and family.

- Only 1 ending.

- No menu [X] since it's very short (no save).

Disclaimer: This project was created using Wolf RPG Editor. All the music and sound used in this project were made available via downloading Wolf RPG Editor.
